net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner

Class HtmlSpanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.HtmlSpanner

  • public class HtmlSpanner
extends java.lang.Object
    HtmlSpanner provides an alternative to Html.fromHtml() from the Android libraries. In its simplest form, just call new HtmlSpanner().fromHtml() to get a similar result. The real strength is in being able to register custom NodeHandlers.

    • Nested Class Summary
